author: entertainment.ie
title: Hotel Deal of the Week: The Brehon & Angsana Spa, Killarney
text:
LUXURY BREAK : €219pps midweek or €229pps weekend – 2 nights Bed & Breakfast and Dinner on one evening in Danú Restaurant. Includes Afternoon Tea on an afternoon of your choice served overlooking the mountains on the Brehon Lawn; discount shopping vouchers to some great shops around Killarney; and relaxation time in the vitality suite of the Angsana Spa. This is a midweek and weekend offer, valid September 1 to December 18, 2015
www.thebrehon.com
